title: aram is unbalanced and bs
body: every game every enemy player is buffed, their damage is buffed, their cooldowns are reduced, i see enemy players use flash up to 13 times with in a 20 minute game, where i can only use twice and it literally on cd for 7 minutes, no bullshitt, im pretty sure 180 seconds does equal 7 minutes, at level 3 enemy players are taking off 80% of my health with one ability every game, wtf is going how is there such a unbalance and handicapp in every aram game.
